description: The underlying issue for CVE-2023-4863 is a heap buffer overflow occurring in the WebP image processing library within Chromium, which is utilized by Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) among other products. The specific build numbers affected include Microsoft Edge 116.0.1938.81, Skype 8.105.0.208, and Microsoft Teams version 1.6.00.26474 and 1.6.00.26463. As detailed in KB-116.0.1938.81, this flaw can potentially be exploited as publicly disclosed attacks are already in the wild, necessitating prompt updates to mitigate these risks.
